CpsSelectComponent.description: CpsSelectComponent is used to select items from a collection.

props.description: Defines the input properties of the component.

values.name: label
values.description: Label of the select component.

values.name: placeholder
values.description: Placeholder text for the select component.

values.name: hint
values.description: Bottom hint text for the select component.

values.name: returnObject
values.description: Returns the object directly rather than the value specified with optionValue.

values.name: multiple
values.description: Specifies if multiple values can be selected.

values.name: disabled
values.description: Specifies whether the component is disabled.

values.name: width
values.description: Width of the select component, of type number denoting pixels or string.

values.name: selectAll
values.description: Option for selecting all elements. Doesn't work with virtual scroll.

values.name: chips
values.description: When selecting elements, they will appear in a form of a chip.

values.name: closableChips
values.description: Determines whether the chips can be directly removed.

values.name: clearable
values.description: When enabled, a clear icon is displayed to clear the value.

values.name: openOnClear
values.description: Determines whether the dropdown list should open on clear.

values.name: options
values.description: An array of options.

values.name: keepInitialOrder
values.description: If multiple, determines whether selected options should be ordered according to the initial order of the options.

values.name: optionLabel
values.description: Name of the label field of an option.

values.name: optionValue
values.description: Name of the value field of an option. Needed only if returnObject prop is false.

values.name: optionInfo
values.description: Name of the info field of an option, shows the additional information text.

values.name: hideDetails
values.description: Hides hint and validation errors.

values.name: persistentClear
values.description: Determines whether the component should have persistent clear icon.

values.name: prefixIcon
values.description: Icon before input value.

values.name: prefixIconSize
values.description: Size of icon before input value, of type number or string or value 'fill', 'xsmall', 'small', 'normal' or 'large'.

values.name: loading
values.description: When enabled, a loading bar is displayed.

values.name: virtualScroll
values.description: Determines whether only the elements within scrollable area should be added into the DOM.

values.name: numToleratedItems
values.description: Determines how many additional elements to add to the DOM outside of the view.

values.name: infoTooltip
values.description: When it is not an empty string, an info icon is displayed to show text for more info.

values.name: infoTooltipClass
values.description: InfoTooltip class for styling.

values.name: infoTooltipMaxWidth
values.description: Max width of infoTooltip of type number denoting pixels or string.

values.name: infoTooltipPersistent
values.description: Determines whether the infoTooltip is persistent.

values.name: infoTooltipPosition
values.description: Position of infoTooltip, it can be 'top', 'bottom', 'left' or 'right'.

values.name: optionsClass
values.description: Class for additional styling of the dropdown list.

values.name: appearance
values.description: Styling appearance of select input, it can be 'outlined', 'underlined' or 'borderless'.

values.name: showChevron
values.description: Determines whether the chevron icon should be displayed.

values.name: _value
values.description: Value of the select component.

emits.description: Defines emit that determine the behavior of the component based on a given condition or report the actions that the component takes.

values.name: valueChanged
values.description: Callback to invoke on value change.

types.description: Defines the custom types used by the module.

values.name: CpsSelectAppearanceType
values.description: CpsSelectAppearanceType is used to define the border of the select input.
